banner.offline.body: Some data may be outdated. Reconnect to refresh.
banner.auth.unauthorized.body: Please reopen the Mini App from the bot to sign in.
banner.auth.initdata.body: Telegram session expired. Close and reopen the Mini App.
banner.auth.server.body: The server is unavailable. Try again soon.
banner.error.body: Reload the mini app to continue.
